Rushdy Said Bughdady Abaza (Arabic) (3 August 1926 - 27 July 1980) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn. A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ijipt
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 53.
A mụrụ Rushdy Abaza na Sharqia, Egypt, nna onye Ijipt, Said Abaza, nke sitere n'otu n'ime ezinụlọ ndị a ma ama n'Ijipt, ezinụlọ Abaza. Rushdy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Collège Saint Marc na Alexandria.
Site n'akụkụ nna ya, o nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ, Ragaa, Mounira, Zeinab na otu nwanne nwoke, Fekri (onye na-eme ihe nkiri)
Site n'akụkụ nne ya, o nwere otu nwanne nne, Hamed
Naanị nwa ya bụ nwa nwanyị, Qismat (Eismat).
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri site n'afọ 1948 ruo 1980; afọ ọ nwụrụ.
